repos_data.description: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models.
Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models.

A simple, lightweight shell script to interact with OpenAI or Ollama or Mistral AI or LocalAI or ZhipuAI from the terminal, and enhancing intelligent system management without any dependencies(pure shell).
Precis is an extensible self-hosted AI-enabled RSS reader with a focus on notifications and support for theming
